name: VR Eyeball Experiment
description:
SteamVR required!

An experiment where you can pluck out your own eyes to throw them around.

Press one button to put your eye back in your head, and another to teleport to that eye. Left hand buttons work with the left eye. Right work on the right eye. You get it.

There are a few different settings for the eyes and how they spin or don't spin when you grab them and throw them. See the youtube video for a bit more of an explanation.
